"The present is the dragorii series inve:
"Oh, it is just at the right time!
I have something to consult you.. In actual fact,
I would like to give a present to my superior
who has always taken good care of me!
This present is somewhat special or what.
It seems that it is the ecology data of some stipulated
Dragorii species... will you be able to collaborate
with me in the collection of the data?"

"お、丁度いいところにっ！
実は、いつもお世話になっている上司へ
プレゼントしたい……ってご相談ありっ！
そのプレゼントが特殊というか何というか。
ある特定の龍族の生態データらしいんだけど
……それのデータ収集のお手伝いとか
協力してくれないかな？"
